item.title: Flare: An Approach to Routing in Lightning Network
item.description: https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/784745976170999810 I will not be as technical as Olaoluwa was. You have nodes that open up payment channels. This scheme is actually developed at the moment in great detail. So how do you find the channels through which to send payments? So we wanted to propose some initial solution to this. Routing requirements It should be source routing because we need the privacy. When a user sends a payment, so the decision of what route to choose should be on the sender side, because if he delegates it to an intermediate node then they don’t have the necessity to privacy as much.
